segments.text: Darling , this dress is for you . I hope you like it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , very beautiful . Thank you , Steven , I like it very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your birthday is coming , and I think this dress suits you . Why not try it now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My birthday present ? I can't help telling you that I am a happy woman , darling . I will come back soon . ( Go to her bedroom and wear the new dress , then show it to Steven . )
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It fits me exactly . How does it look like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It displays your slender figure , darling .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The most important thing is that you bought it for me . I am happy that you know my size and style .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because you are my dear wife .
segments.speaker: S2
